title.en: Nice birdie ~Hole in one in your heart~

altTitles.ja: ナイスバーディー　～あなたのハートにホールインワン～

description.en:
With a cute face, the attit is amazing!
The trajectory of effort and desire traced by a H-loving girl who aims to be a professional golfer with a nice body as a weapon!
Her trainee, Chisato Matsuzawa, a beautiful and busty girl, is serious about becoming a professional golfer... but she is attacked by many men because of her beauty.
However, she is rumored to be a sageman who enjoys sex even if she is fucked because she loves sex, and the men who have committed are squeezed out and become unwell.
Ishida, who was preparing for the final selection of the protest, also saw Chisato who came back from running and took off her clothes without being able to suppress her desire, and after committing it, he was in a bad mood. Worried that Chisato's influence will spread to other professional candidates around her , the instructor tries
to get her to quit...!?
The definitive edition of a masterpiece sexual sports comedy that depicts a big turmoil involving us!

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/ナイスバーディー-芳文社コミックス-蝦名-いくお/dp/4832228617
